section.title: Related work
section.p: Lighweight DITA is based on DITA 2.0, defined in Darwin Information Typing Architecture (DITA) Version 2.0, an OASIS Standard.

li.cite: Darwin Information Typing Architecture (DITA) Version 2.0, DITA for Technical Content

section.title: Abstract
section.p: LwDITA is a simplified version of DITA, expressed in three file formats: XML, HTML5, and Markdown.
